basics.name: Abdelrahman "Boda" Sadallah
basics.label: MSc, NLP
basics.summary: MSc Student in Artificial Intelligence at Mohammed Bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI). My research interests include Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning. I am passionate about solving real-world problems using AI technologies.

work.name: Mohammed Bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI)
work.summary: MSc Student at the Natural Language Processing Department. My research interests include Arabic NLP.

publications.name: ANER: Arabic and Arabizi Named Entity Recognition using Transformer-Based Approach

projects.name: ANER Project (Graduation Project)
projects.summary: Trained Named Entity Recognition Model for Arabic, which can recognize 50 different entities. It's a Fine-tuned model over Arabert (Arabic Bert Model trained for Masked Language task) for the NER task.
